thread.title: Delta Airlines Check In: Tickets and Reservations
thread.title_full: Delta Airlines Check In: Tickets and Reservations

author: By Arlene Fleming
title: Delta Airlines Check In: Tickets and Reservations
text:
kalleboo/Flickr/CC BY 2.0 Delta Airlines offers check in online. Let's go over the specifics of their web check in services:
Delta Airlines - Check in up to 24 hours prior to departure. Need one of the following for checking in online - SkyMiles number and PIN, reservation number, e-ticket number on your ticket, or the credit card number used to pay for your ticket. If you have luggage to check you can drop off your luggage at any curbside check in or baggage drop location. Can be used for both domestic and international travel.
